src:
Kekhawatiran GOT7 Usung Konsep Seksi di Album 'Call My Name'
05 Nov 2019, 15:48 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Member GOT7 mengakui sempat tak percaya diri dengan konsep terbaru seperti dalam 'You Calling My Name'. (dok. JYP Entertainment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- GOT7 merilis mini album ke-10 'Call My Name' dengan 'You Calling My Name' sebagai lagu utama. Mini album tersebut dirilis lima bulan setelah mereka mengeluarkan 'Spinning Top: Between Security & Insecurity' yang memiliki 'Eclipse' sebagai lagu utama.GOT7 kembali dengan konsep seksi dan elegan seperti yang telah ditampilkan dalam Eclipse. Namun, konsep tersebut terlihat lebih matang dan berbeda dengan sentuhan musik You Calling My Name yang lebih soft dan sederhana dibandingkan sebelumnya.Para member pun mengaku sempat khawatir dan deg-degan sebelum merilis mini album terbaru. Sebab, Call My Name berkonsep seksi dan sendu pada saat bersamaan."Ini merupakan konsep baru yang kami coba. Kami penasaran penggemar akan menyukainya atau tidak. Saya harap banyak orang menyukainya," kata Yugyeom seperti dilansir Osen via Naver.Demi menampilkan konsep seksi yang baik, Yugyeom mengatakan mereka harus berdiet keras. Sebab dalam lagu terbaru, mereka lebih 'terbuka' dibandingkan video-video musik sebelumnya."Kami bekerja keras agar penggemar menikmatinya. Tapi akan sulit menampilkan konsep terbuka seperti itu di atas panggung, karena itu akan disiarkan," ucap member termuda GOT7 tersebut.Dalam video musik You Calling My Name, ketujuh member GOT7 menunjukkan mereka semua layak jadi visual grup. Namun, ketika diharuskan memilih, mereka setuju bahwa sang leader Im Jaebum (JB) adalah member terseksi dalam comeback kali ini."Kami semua setuju JB (terseksi)," ucap Mark dan Jin-young."Saya kira saya terlihat seperti itu karena penurunan berat badan," jawab JB.


Para member GOT7 sepakat Im Jaebum alias JB yang paling seksi di antara mereka. (dok. JYP Entertainment)

Selain visual, JB mengatakan musik GOT7 juga berubah. Jika biasanya grup asuhan JYP Entertainment itu dikenal kaya dengan paduan sejumlah genre, kali ini mereka membawakan aransemen musik yang lebih sederhana. Senada, Jinyoung mengatakan genre musik mereka sudah benar-benar berubah. Menurutnya, satu hal yang tak berubah adalah selalu 'melibatkan' Ahgase (IGOT7), sebutan bagi penggemar GOT7.Video musik You Calling My Name diramaikan dengan warna hijau neon yang menjadi warna identitas Ahgase. Liriknya pun menceritakan tentang perasaan member kepada penggemar."Meski genrenya baru, fondasi lagu kami tetap sama," tutur Jinyoung.Call My Name memiliki enam lagu yakni You Calling My Name, Pray, Now or Never, Thursday, Run Away dan Crash & Burn. Para member terlibat langsung dalam pembuatan mini album tersebut.JB menulis lirik You Calling My Name bersama CEO JYP Entertainment Park Jin-young. Ia juga membuat lagu Pray dan Thursday. Sementara Jinyoung menulis lirik lagu Run Away. Sang maknae (member termuda), Yugyeom, turut terlibat dalam penulisan Crash & Burn.Mini album Call My Name sudah dirilis di banyak platform musik dan bisa dinikmati sejak Senin (4/11) sore. (chri/rea)
text:
GOT7 Concerns Carry Out Sexy Concepts on 'Call My Name' Album
05 Nov 2019, 15:48 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


GOT7 members admitted that they had no confidence in the latest concepts as in 'You Calling My Name'. (doc. JYP Entertainment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - GOT7 released the 10th mini album 'Call My Name' with 'You Calling My Name' as the main song. The mini album was released five months after they released 'Spinning Top: Between Security & Insecurity' which has 'Eclipse' as the main song. GOT7 returned with a sexy and elegant concept as shown in Eclipse. However, the concept looks more mature and different from the touch of You Calling My Name music which is softer and simpler than before. The members also claimed to have been worried and excited before releasing the latest mini album. Because, Call My Name is a sexy and wistful concept at the same time. "This is a new concept that we are trying. We are curious whether fans will like it or not. I hope many people like it," Yugyeom said as reported by Osen via Naver. well, Yugyeom said they have to go on a hard diet. Because in the latest song, they are more 'open' than the previous music videos. "We are working hard so that fans enjoy it. But it will be difficult to display such an open concept on stage, because it will be broadcast," said the youngest member of GOT7. You Calling My Name's music video, the seven members of GOT7 show they all deserve to be a visual group. However, when required to vote, they agreed that leader Im Jaebum (JB) was the sexiest member in the comeback this time. "We all agreed JB (sexiest)," Mark and Jin-young said. "I think I look like that because of the decline weight, "JB replied.


The members of GOT7 agreed that Im Jaebum alias JB was the sexiest of them. (doc. JYP Entertainment)

Besides visuals, JB said the music of GOT7 also changed. If usually JYP Entertainment's care group is known to be rich with a blend of genres, this time they brought a simpler music arrangement. Similarly, Jinyoung said their genre of music had really changed. According to him, one thing that has not changed is to always 'involve' Ahgase (IGOT7), a term for fans of GOT7. The music video You Calling My Name is enlivened with neon green color which is the color of Ahgase's identity. The lyrics also tell about the members' feelings to fans. "Even though the genre is new, the foundation of our song remains the same," said Jinyoung. Call My Name has six songs namely You Calling My Name, Pray, Now or Never, Thursday, Run Away and Crash & Burn . The members were directly involved in making the mini album. JB wrote the lyrics of You Calling My Name with JYP Entertainment CEO Park Jin-young. He also made the songs Pray and Thursday. While Jinyoung wrote the lyrics to the song Run Away. The maknae (youngest member), Yugyeom, was involved in writing Crash & Burn. The mini album Call My Name has been released on many music platforms and can be enjoyed since Monday (4/11) afternoon. (chri / rea)
